title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description: Description: Label font size doesn't change right away when it is modified.
OB: The label height remains unchanged immediately after modifying the font size in the UI.
EB: Expect the label height to adjust accordingly immediately after modifying the font size in the UI.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Navigate to the UI where label font size can be modified.
2. Modify the font size of the label.
3. Observe that the label height does not change as expected.
